import data from "../data/data"; import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; function ProductView(props) { const [model, setModel] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { model.push(data.product.find((i) => i.Id === props.match.params.id)); alert(model); }, []); return (

{model.name}



Ürün Kodu: {model.code}



Adet Fiyatı: {model.lastPrice} TL



İndirimli Adet Fiyatı: {model.price} TL


); } export default ProductView;
